summary: A member of Coast Guard Platoon 23, Private Kang monitors a high-infiltration stretch of beach lined with barbed-wire fencing. Driven by the belief that killing a spy is the highest honor, he waits for a chance to prove his worth.
cast: Jang Dong-Gun|Jeong-hak Kim|Ji-a Park|Hae-Jin Yoo|Jin Jeong|Gu-taek Kim|Kang-woo Kim|Yun-jae Park|Kim Tae-Woo|Yeong-jae Kim|Mi-seong Kim|Choe Min|Sang-ok Park
title: Hae anseon
